contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Oceansofthemind.jpg|frame|right|First issue cover]] '''''Oceans of the Mind''''' was a quarterly [[science fiction magazine]] published in 2001-2006. Each themed issue focused on some aspect of the future, such as space colonization, future crime, spirituality, or the military. The magazine closed in 2006 due to a lack of subscriptions. ==See also== * [[List of defunct American periodicals]] == References == * http://www.locusmag.com/ * http://www.philsp.com/ ==External links== *[http://www.oceansofthemind.com Official site] [[Category:Publications established in 2001]] [[Category:Publications disestablished in 2006]] [[Category:Defunct science fiction magazines of the United States]] {{sf-stub}}
